sources.title: Carnival Story (1954) ANNE BAXTER â™¥ STEVE COCHRAN
sources.description:
Stars: Anne Baxter, Steve Cochran, Lyle Bettger 
Director: Kurt Neumann

An American carnival in Germany sets the scene for sin, sex and melodrama.

metadata.Plot: In search of better business, a big American carnival opens in Munich, Germany. Joe the barker befriends attractive pickpocket Willie, finds her a job, and beds her. Then high diver Frank recruits Willie as his assistant. When Frank falls for her and proposes marriage, Joe takes the opportunity to brush her off. After the marriage, Joe figures he can still exercise his sexual hold over Willie; but tragedy intervenes.
metadata.Writer: Hans Jacoby, Kurt Neumann, Marcy Klauber
metadata.Actors: Anne Baxter, Steve Cochran, Lyle Bettger
